page.title: 14Landscape and Architecture
page.content: weathering. The stone is also naturally soft and this has led to many of the buildings being rendered or refaced to preserve them. Secondly, many of the houses have been altered over the years, smaller dwellings being incorporated into larger units, and industrial buildings being converted into dwellings, and these factors have contributed to the varied appearance of the buildings. The only large modern building is the water bottling plant which is contructed of a steel frame with metal cladding. No modern housing development has taken place, apart from the low rise council housing and the refilling of gap sites with housing in traditional materials.
